sources.title: Gun Code (1940) TIM McCOYüçï COWBOY WESTERN
sources.description:
Stars: Tim McCoy, Inna Gest, Lou Fulton, Dave O'Brien
Director: Peter Stewart

Saddle up for a pulse-pounding classic Western featuring legendary cowboy hero Tim McCoy in a tale of revenge, justice, and frontier courage. Directed by Peter Stewart, this gripping film dives deep into a town under siege by ruthless extortionists, crooked bankers, and the fight to end their reign of terror.

When a brave citizen dares to stand up to the gang's "protection" racket, he's met with cold-blooded murder. Now, his son, with justice burning in his heart, vows to take down the villains who hold the town in fear. With thrilling performances from Inna Gest, Lou Fulton, and Dave O'Brien, this cinematic gem captures the spirit of the Old West, where courage and determination are tested in every showdown.

Whether you're a fan of Tim McCoy‚Äôs iconic cowboy roles, tales of Western outlaws, or riveting revenge dramas, Gun Code delivers the action and suspense you crave. Perfect for PizzaFLIX enthusiasts and lovers of Western classics, this film is a must-watch for those who cherish stories of courage, loyalty, and the relentless pursuit of justice.

Rediscover Western greatness with Gun Code!
Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

metadata.Plot: An extortion gang, headed by Banker J. M. Bradley, controls the cowtown of Miller's Flats and saloon owner McClure aids Bradley in operating a so-called "business protectice organization". Garrett, reform editor of the newspaper is murdered, and Marshal Tim Hammond arrives to find his father, Parson Hammond, has also been killed. Garrett's young son, Jerry, takes Tim to his sister Betty, who is now editing the paper. Slim Doyle, collector for the gang, is beaten up by Tim as he tries to collect money from Betty. Under the name of Hays, Tim opens up a blacksmith shop. Bradley discovers Tim's true identity and orders him eliminated. With the aid of Sheriff Kramer, Tim has Slim arrested on a trumped-up charge of murder, and then incites the townspeople to stage a "fake" attack on the jail to lynch Slim, who breaks down and offers to confess. Betty is informed by telephone that the gang has kidnapped Jerry and he will only be released in exchange for Slim. The sheriff and Tim fake a fight that allows Slim to excape, but Tim has men posted along the road to watch where Slim goes. Tim and a posse follow and wipe out all the gang members except the unknown leader. While searching the hideout shack, Tim sees some peculiar characters scrawled on a wall, and remembers having seen Bradley scratch similar figures on his desk. This gives Tim sufficient evidence to go after Bradley.
metadata.Actors: Tim McCoy, Inna Gest, Lou Fulton
